text_block_list.text:
On the way home from an outing with 
Sakura Bakushin O, we were talking about 
her classmate.

She was leaving the school. She 
had said that she "wanted to give 
it her all in her last race."――
choice_data_list: That girl's last race, it's tomorrow, isn't it.
That girl's last race, it's tomorrow, isn't it.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Yes! I've done all I can, and I'm
absolutely for-certain she'll win first
place!!

On the day of the race, Sakura Bakushin 
O's entire class showed up to watch the 
mock race.
choice_data_list: It's finally time for the match.
It's finally time for the match.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Don't worry!! 
You have the capabilities to do the best 
Bakushin there ever was!

text_block_list.name: Freckled Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
Yeah! 
Bakushinbakushin, right!

As the race began, Sakura Bakushin O and 
the others cheered loudly for their 
classmate.

text_block_list.name: Classmate A
text_block_list.text:
Nice going, good, good! 
It's coming―!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
That's it right there, that's it!! 
Let's show everyone the fruits of our 
labor!!

text_block_list.name: Freckled Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
(Baku-chan, everyone… Truly, thank you 
all so much.)

text_block_list.name: Freckled Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: (Go on and watch me, this is my――)

text_block_list.name: Freckled Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: The best I can do, Bakushin…!!!!!

Before long, the race was over, and the 
results for her classmate are――

text_block_list.name: Classmate B
text_block_list.text:
Fifth place, you got fifth place! 
You're in the top five!!

text_block_list.name: Classmate C
text_block_list.text:
Haha, she's waving! 
She looks so happy!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: …Uuuuugh…!

text_block_list.name: Classmate D
text_block_list.text: Baku-chan?
choice_data_list: Sorry, I'm gonna go talk to her alone for a minute.
Sorry, I'm gonna go talk to her alone for a minute.

text_block_list.text:
I pulled Sakura Bakushin O's hand, who 
was shocked by the results, and moved to 
a place where we could talk comfortably.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Uuug… This is all my lack of ability!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
I'm the class president, I said I'd
help! And yet, I couldn't get her to win
first place…!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
It's her last race, 
and I…!!
choice_data_list: But she looked so happy.
But she looked so happy.
Pull yourself together, class president!
Pull yourself together, class president!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
It's her last race, 
and I…!!
choice_data_list: But she looked so happy.
But she looked so happy.
Pull yourself together, class president!
Pull yourself together, class president!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Th, that's… I can't deny that.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
When she was running, and when she 
reached the goal, she looked so happy 
and cheerful.
choice_data_list: Because it was a result she could be proud of.
Because it was a result she could be proud of.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
…Yes. 
I was the only one who was obsessed with 
first place.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Fu-fu, what a pathetic class president, 
misreading the wishes of her classmates.
choice_data_list: Do you know what you need to do now?
Do you know what you need to do now?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
I must congratulate her! I should be the
one to take the initiative――

text_block_list.name: Freckled Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
Ah! 
There she is, there she is, Baku-chan!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: You're…!

text_block_list.name: Freckled Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: I just got the best ranking ever!

text_block_list.name: Freckled Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
Thanks to Baku-chan and everyone… 
It was the best race ever!!

text_block_list.name: Freckled Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Ba, Baku-chan!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
A hug, to celebrate how bravely you 
fought!! 
It was… the best Bakushin ever!

text_block_list.name: Freckled Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: ….Yeah……Yeah!!

Sakura Bakushin O and her classmates 
shed tears of joy and hugged each other 
for a long while.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Y, yessir!?
choice_data_list: Remind yourself what she wanted.
Remind yourself what she wanted.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Well, ah… She said she wanted to finish
her last race with a satisfying run.
choice_data_list: So, did she not do that today?
So, did she not do that today?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
By no means!! I deny it in the name of
the class president!!
choice_data_list: Then, it shouldn't matter if you're in first or not.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
…That's right. 
I must congratulate her on her results!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
It's frustrating, but… it's rude to her
to be frustrated!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Let's get back to her! And then,
compliment her to the fullest――

text_block_list.name: Freckled Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
Ah! 
There she is, there she is, Baku-chan!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: You're…!

text_block_list.name: Freckled Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: I just got the best ranking ever!

text_block_list.name: Freckled Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
Thanks to Baku-chan and everyone… 
It was the best race ever!!

text_block_list.name: Freckled Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Ba, Baku-chan!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
A hug, to celebrate how bravely you 
fought!! 
It was… the best Bakushin ever!

text_block_list.name: Freckled Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: ….Yeah……Yeah!!

Sakura Bakushin O and her classmates 
shed tears of joy and hugged each other 
for a long while.
